parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the endpoint group.

parameters.name: ListenerId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom routing listener.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
